summary: An FBI 302 form documenting the interview of a 17-year-old female victim (referred to as 'Victim 1' in the context) regarding her sexual exploitation by Jeffrey Epstein. She details meeting Epstein at age 14, providing massages that escalated to sexual acts, the recruitment of other girls, and various gifts and interactions over approximately three years.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the investigation. The victim describes providing massages at his Palm Beach residence that involved sexual acts, him paying her and other girls, and him making inappropriate requests.

persons.name: Tony LNU
persons.context: Boyfriend of the victim and father of her child. He was present during some interactions and the victim called him from Epstein's residence.

persons.name: Michael Jackson
persons.context: Mentioned briefly as someone the victim spoke to over the telephone during a visit to Epstein's residence.

connections.description: Epstein exploited the victim, who was Tony LNU's girlfriend and the mother of his child.
Epstein paid the victim for massages that involved sexual acts, starting when she was 14. He also asked her to recruit other girls.

events.title: Victim introduced to Epstein
events.description: The victim, then 14, was introduced to Jeffrey Epstein by an unnamed individual.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim was interviewed by the FBI in West Palm Beach, FL, regarding the sexual exploitation of minors by Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Birth of Victim's Child
events.description: The victim's child, Sidon, was born. The father is identified as Tony LNU.

events.title: Photography Session at Epstein's Residence
events.description: When the victim was approximately 16, she was paid to pose for photographs in various locations at Epstein's Palm Beach residence, taken with a digital camera.

events.title: Introduction to Unidentified Female
events.description: During a massage session, Epstein introduced an unidentified tan female with dark brown hair and had sexual intercourse with her while the victim was present.

locations: West Palm Beach, FL (FBI interview location)
Thailand (mentioned as location of another girl)
keyFacts: The victim began providing massages for Jeffrey Epstein at age 14, which quickly escalated to sexual acts, including Epstein masturbating and requests for her to undress.
The victim visited Epstein's Palm Beach residence over 100 times over approximately three years, and Epstein paid her $200-$400 per session, with extra money for removing clothing.
Epstein asked the victim to recruit other, younger girls for him and paid her for each girl she brought.
The victim provided the FBI with a book titled 'Massage for Dummies' that Epstein had given her, which was entered into evidence.
The victim stated she felt 'taken advantage of' and 'always felt dirty' when leaving Epstein's residence, and she believed there might be hidden cameras there.
